long_description: Delivering warmth without the bulk of wool, the Sprigs Organic Icon hat is made of soft, stretchy cotton for a sleek profile. A Thinsulate(R) Flex polyester lining traps heat to keep you cozy. Organic cotton is naturally soft, breathable and grown without the use of toxic pesticides; added stretch helps retain shape. Overstock.
short_description: Delivering warmth without the bulk of wool, the Sprigs Organic Icon hat is made of soft, stretchy cotton for a sleek profile. A Thinsulate(R) Flex polyester lining traps heat to keep you cozy.
